com.dinggoapplication.Entity

Class Deal

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dinggoapplication.Entity.Deal
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PercentageDiscount, TierDiscount

    public abstract class Deal
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Leon on 16/2/2015. Abstract class to hold all the different type of deals
